short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automates and seamlessly organizes your downloads

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Autosort keeps your downloads neat and organized! It automates the sorting of your downloaded files into designated folders based on file types, allowing you to find your images, videos, music/audio, and documents easily. All the user needs to do is pre-create these subfolders in their Downloads Directory, save their preferences, and Autosort will take care of the rest, automatically moving files to their appropriate locations as soon as they are downloaded/saved.
